trackpad:ShatterPower.NAME: Shatter
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time a Reflection dies, this enemy gains 1 thorns. If this enemy goes 3 turns without losing HP, It spawns a reflection that deals 15 damage.

trackpad:ReflectionPower.NAME: Reflection
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon losing HP, spawns a Reflection that intends to attack for damage equal to HP lost.
